title: Global pineapple production by leading countries 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The Production in thousand metric tons is highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Colombia.
There is a difference of 2517.76 between the maximum Country Costa Rica and minimum Country Colombia.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Production in thousand metric tons 3418.16 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Colombia where Country is 900.4.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The Production in thousand metric tons is highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Colombia.
There is a difference of 2517.76 between the maximum Country Costa Rica and minimum Country Colombia.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Production in thousand metric tons 3418.16 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Colombia where Country is 900.4.
Second maximum Production in thousand metric tons is found at Country Philippines.
The Production in thousand metric tons of Country Colombia is 3.8% smaller than the maximum value at Costa Rica.
Production in thousand metric tons at Country Costa Rica is 3418.16 , second place is Philippines at 2730.99, and thirdly is Brazil at 2650.48.
The highest value 3418.16 at Costa Rica is almost 1.75 times larger than the average value 1956.25.
